As a result, the more they remember, the brighter they shine, and the more they forget, the dimmer they become.

The Shadow People are drawn to the memories of the inhabitants, feeding on their recollections to sustain their own existence. As the inhabitants forget their past, the Shadow People grow stronger, and vice versa.
